Documents/Programming/Projects/Bookmarksman/GoogleTalker.h

00001 // A class supporting http connections with Google.
00002 // Logs in to Google if required, handles user interaction
00003 // Operation is synchronous; i.e. the entry method
00004 // googleTalkerWithURL:httpMethod:bodyString:etc. blocks
00005 // the invoking thread until the response is either finished
00006 // or is cancelled by the user.
00007 // GoogleTalker is written as a state machine.
00008 
00009 @interface GoogleTalker : NSObject {
00010         // state variables
00011         int _whatsNext ;  
00012         BOOL _newAccountWanted ;
00013         BOOL _accountEmailIsFromBmxBk ; // In this case, we don't allow changes
00014         BOOL _openInBrowserForViewingOrCaptcha ;
00015         BOOL _googleLoginNeedsSettlingTimeForOtherApps ;
00016         
00017         // other variables
00018         float _timeout ;
00019         NSString* _url ;
00020         NSString* _bodyString; 
00021         NSString* _httpMethod ;
00022         int _responseType ;
00023         NSHTTPURLResponse* _response ;
00024         NSData* _responseData ;
00025         NSString* _proposedAlternateProfileName ;
00026         NSError* _error ;
00027         id _bmxBk ; // weak
00028         float _progress ;
00029 }
00030 
00031 + (NSString*)zxRandomBase64 ;
00032 + (int)zxRandomDecimal ;
00033 
00034 + (BOOL)googleTalkerWithURL:(NSString*)url
00035                                  httpMethod:(NSString*)httpMethod
00036                                  bodyString:(NSString*)bodyString
00037                  responseStatusCode:(int*)ptrResponseStatusCode
00038                         responseHeaders:(NSDictionary**)hdlResponseHeaders
00039                            responseData:(NSData**)hdlResponseData
00040                                           bmxBk:(id)bmxBk ;     
00041         @end
